_meta.title: forest_a six baselines, 20 runs, grouped figures (4 per image)
_meta.summary: Evaluate A*, A*-MPC, Hybrid A*, Hybrid A*-MPC, RRT*, and RRT-MPC on forest_a with 20 random runs and grouped path/control figures.
notes: Random start-goal reachability filtering uses Hybrid A* via --rand-reject-policy hybrid_astar.
Grouped figures are exported in 4-run chunks, expected 5 path groups + 5 control groups for 20 runs.
